name: InnoApps Technologies Pvt. Ltd
description:
We are a global, multinational team of technology experts that all have a single goal in mind – achieve exceptional relationships with our customers. Spread around the globe in India, Australia, and US, we understand the value of innovation, uniqueness, and competition. Using the latest tech tools, we offer innovative solutions through a comprehensive portfolio. Customers will find all-in-one solution packages that are designed to meet all their needs.
Ordinary does not cut it anymore, a fact we at InnoApps understood early on. We measure our effectiveness only through customers’ success, which we achieve by meeting and surpassing clients’ expectations.
Thus, our development team members are all highly trained, self-motivated individuals who possess deep knowledge regarding different IT products. We offer a wide range of solutions for customers, including data analytics, UX/UI design, smart AI, cloud computing, IoT infrastructure, and software engineering services.
SERVICES & SOLUTIONS: Enterprise Mobility | Consumer Mobile & Web Apps | iOS, Android, Salesforce, Titanium, Phone gap, HTML 5 Apps | ROR, JAVA, PHP Custom Web development | App Performance | App Maintenance | App Promotion | App Security | Business Analytics | UI/UX Design | Logo Design | Graphics Designing | Enterprise Content Management | Gaming Apps | Native & Cross-Platform Apps | Internet of Things | M-Commerce & E-Commerce | Quality & Testing Solutions | IT Support | Enterprise Cloud | Xamarin Development | Digital Marketing | iBeacon Apps | Digital Lifecycle | Augmented Reality | Wearable Device Apps | Ionic & Angular JS | OCR Apps | RFID Apps | Emoji | Bitcoin Apps | iWatch Apps
READ MORE...
